content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Completely yummy and delicious comfort Korean food! Great choices for drink pairings and small/intimate space. I've had a few moments where rowdy crowds have made an appearance there but generally this is a nice spot to have some good food with close friends or family!
